thread.section_title: ScreenPrinting.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ScreenPrinting.com | screenprinting.com
thread.title: Aaron

author: Aaron
title: Aaron
text: I took the class in NY at Montage clothing. The experience was filled with information and the instructor Greg was very personable and friendly. Along with those qualities he is also very knowledgeable not only in the technical side but also in the business side and able to guide students in business practices as well. Would recommend to others looking to get a foot in the industry.
